entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:07 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
